title: Graphic Designer. Dedicated Graphics Design Towards Streamers. (Example of work provided)

embed.description: VII Designs, is a Graphic design company that designs graphics for streamers.

body:
Hey guys im an OCE Graphics designer, Dedicated towards streamer. Mainly design:
Pre-Game Overlays
- Buttons
- Logo's
- Banners
- Icons
And a lot more. (*Unfortunately we do not design in-Game Overlays*).

*If you wish to contact The design team. Please contact them on the following: (or just PM Me):*
**Skype:** VIIDesigns
**Twitch:** VIIDesigns
**Email:** DesignsVII@Hotmail.com

Examples of Of Overlays Below: (View our website for more Examples of Overlays):
